code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navbar=_ref=>{let{li}=_ref;const[window,setWindow]=useState(false);let openClose=()=>{if(window===false){setWindow(true);}else{setWindow(false);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{className:"navbar-menu",style:{width:window===false?250:60},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"burger",onClick:()=>openClose(),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"img/menu.svg",alt:"burger"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:"navbar__list",children:["li=",[["Dashboard","img/dashboard.svg"],["Restautant’s","img/restaurant.svg"],["Manage User’s","img/manage user.svg"],["Manage Order’s","img/manage  order.svg"],["Manage Coupon’s","img/manage coupon.svg"]],li.map((item,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"navbar__li-box",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:item[1],alt:item[1],style:{paddingLeft:window===false?27:17}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"navbar__li",style:{display:window===false?"inline-block":"none"},children:item[0]})]},i))]})]});};export default Navbar;
